resources.string:
App Credits and Dependencies

 Released: May, 2020
 
 
Language: Java
 
Programmer: Mandeep Singh
 
Database: Firebase
 
Database Provider: Google
 

 
MaterialDrawer Team: MikePenz, 

 Site: github.com/MikePenz 
 
Graphics Team 

 Icons: AndroidIconics Library 

 Material Icons 

 Octicons Library 

 Flaticons 

Freepik Vectors


 Dependencies:- 
 Framework: Android Framework Provided by Google 

 SDK: Android SDK Targeted at min 29 update 

 Compile SDK Ver: 28 

 Target SDK: 29


Version Info

Application Id: com.hackbaba.Doto


Libraries


Androidx AppCompat 

Material Library 

Fragment Library For com.fragment.manager 

Sdp Library For Responsive Design 

Constraint Library For Constraint Layouts 

Android CardView 

Custom Tabs Library 

Espresso-Core Library 

Mikepenz MaterialDrawer Library 

Fontawesome Library For SVG Type Fonts 

Octicons Library For Material Icons 
 
Product Flavors:- 

 
 strawberry: 
 dimension "icecream" 
 applicationIdSuffix ".strawberry"


 
chocolate: 
 dimension "icecream" 
applicationIdSuffix ".chocolate"



vanilla: 
 dimension "icecream" 
applicationIdSuffix ".vanilla"


Build Variants: Debug,Release 

Original Website Development: Github Support Library 

Licensing Information


Mandeep Singh 
Student Of UIC 
Chandigarh University


Copyright 2020 Mandeep Singh


Informal citations should include the website name, URL (provide the specific URL of the page you’re citing, as appropriate), and the Developer’s name. For example: “ All About 2Dos website, www.deepsingh132.github.io/2Dos, © HACK BABA INC..” 

For inclusion in a formal Literature Cited section, cite in the following manner, providing specific page names and URLs as appropriate:

funded by Caffeine !
